REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0963 reute r f BC-UTILICORP-<UCU>-ACQUI 03-02 0038

TEXT.TITLE: UTILICORP <UCU> ACQUIRES DOMINION <D> SUBSIDIARY
TEXT.BODY: UtiliCorp United Inc said it has closed the previously announced acquisition of West Virginia Power from Dominion Resources Inc for about 21 mln dlrs. Reuter
